Tracking resources for the 2020 Wallbridge(13-4) fire.

Scanners

These scanners have been most useful in terms of tracking where firefighters have been concentrating their efforts.

- Sonoma CAL FIRE
- All Sonoma County Scanners

Maps

- Sonoma County Incident Map (includes evacuation zones)
- Aerial traffic, including tankers
- Location, intensity, and wind.
- Detailed wind speed and direction

Webcams

- Mt Jackson (north, north-west facing view)
- Mt Jackson (north, north-east facing view)
- Rockpile (south facing view)

Timelapse

12pm to 2:30pm 8/19/20 from Mt Jackson

Twitter Accounts

- Sonoma Sheriff
- Official County of Sonoma
- Sonoma County Scanner Updates
- CAL FIRE

Alerts

- Evacuation Orders via Nixle

Misc

Information Phone #: (707) 967-4207
